name: Destruct Loop
description:
Your ship is about to self destruct! You need to find all of the parts and save yourself or risk being trapped in a time loop forever!

This game was made in about a day over Labor Day Weekend 2015.

Controls

Movement WASD

Jump Space

Look Mouse

Interact F


Authors

Graphical Assets: Hardy Whitney and Lucas Rumney

Code: Hardy Whitney and Lucas Rumney


Contact Us

For questions regarding installation, or bugs please contact us at:
jetdriftstudio@gmail.com

Questions or Comments regarding code are also always welcome!
